sourcesContent:
// webapp/frontend/src/components/WaterTraceDashboard.js import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardContent } from './ui/card'; import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from './ui/tabs'; const WaterTraceDashboard = () => { const [historicalData, setHistoricalData] = useState([]); const [recentData, setRecentData] = useState([]); const [combinedData, setCombinedData] = useState([]); const [summary, setSummary] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchData(); }, []); const fetchData = async () => { try { // Fetch all data const [historicalRes, recentRes, summaryRes] = await Promise.all([ fetch('/api/historical/timeseries'), fetch('/api/recent/timeseries'), fetch('/api/analysis/summary') ]); const historical = await historicalRes.json(); const recent = await recentRes.json(); const summaryData = await summaryRes.json(); setHistoricalData(historical.data || []); setRecentData(recent.data || []); // Combine historical and recent data for overview const combined = [ ...(historical.data || []).map(d => ({ ...d, source: 'GRACE (Historical)' })), ...(recent.data || []).map(d => ({ ...d, source: 'GLDAS (Recent)' })) ].sort((a, b) => new Date(a.date) - new Date(b.date)); setCombinedData(combined); setSummary(summaryData); setLoading(false); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching data:', error); setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) { return
Loading WaterTrace Dashboard...
; } return (
{/* Header */}

WaterTrace: Pakistan Groundwater Monitoring

Comprehensive satellite-based groundwater analysis for Pakistan (2002-2024)

Developed by Tayyab Manan

{/* Summary Cards */} {summary && (

GRACE measurements (2002-2017)

GLDAS measurements (2018-2024)

 Total Coverage
22

Years of monitoring
)} {/* Main Analysis Tabs */} Overview Historical (2002-2017) Recent (2018-2024) Comparison Conclusion {/* Overview Tab */} Complete Timeline: Pakistan Groundwater Monitoring (2002-2024) [value.toFixed(2), name]} contentStyle={{ backgroundColor: '#eff6ff', border: '1px solid #3b82f6' }} />

Note:

• 2002-2017: Direct GRACE satellite measurements

• 2018-2024: GLDAS deep soil moisture proxy data

 {/* Historical Tab */} Historical Groundwater Trends (GRACE 2002-2017) [value, 'Groundwater Anomaly (cm)']} /> {/* Recent Tab */} Recent Water Status (GLDAS 2018-2024) [value, 'Deep Soil Moisture (m³/m³)']} /> {/* Comparison Tab */}
Dataset Comparison

GRACE (2002-2017)

Direct groundwater measurements

163 data points over 15 years

GLDAS (2018-2024)

Soil moisture proxy for groundwater

Monthly averages from 3-hourly data

 Key Findings {summary && (
    {summary.key_findings.map((finding, index) => (

)}
{/* Footer */}

Tayyab Manan

GIS Developer & Data Analyst

© 2024 WaterTrace - Monitoring Pakistan's Water Resources

); }; export default WaterTraceDashboard;
